item.title: Lab 5: VR Locomotion Implementation
item.description: Initial ideas… Recap Rocketer Errors… Moving Left & Right != Turning Left & Right Final Implementation — My Drivekour Game

item.title: Lab 4: Parkour
item.description: How to open a folder as a Unity Project Double-clicking Scene file opens the project in unity. (It might cause crash of Unity). Then restart hub and select a unity version for it. My Locomotion Technique ideas… Inspiration Rocketer (Click to check the presentation slide) On class example for presenting the idea: Target : Develop a Swimming Technique in VR Requirements: Make user feel that they are moving forward or backward Method: detect distance and have the matrix Evaluate: Set a Goal: perform best swimming experience
